the only one doing it with great quality and subs

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo: Youkoso Tsugumi Ryou e

Good Comments: nice~~
Simply the best you can get at this point. OP/ED Karaoke, no typos, correct grammar, no annoying typeset, signs subbed.
Translation not accurate.
MKV release of episode one had playback problems for several people.
Very slow releases.. its been 2 months already.
their subs and quality are good
No group can compare with this. All aspects... translation, karaoke, typesetting... everything.
They take their sweet time to produce something so sickly sweet and full of moe I want to just roll up into a ball and go 'hauuuuu' all day long!!!
Bad Comments: What vid in the eye-catch? Translation is good, editing is smooth... goes along well with the characters tone/voice... karaoke effects are great and good typesetting.
Many incorrect translations as usual from Moetaku. Editing is a bit sketchy at certain points, especially with the 3-line subs. That's also a sign of lazy timing.
hrmm pretty hard to not vote for the group i belong to innit? XDhowever I feel that in comparison to the other groups releases, ours does come out on top

pretty nice subs!!!
slow but great translation

great sub
